name: Lenco Mobile USA
tag_list: mobile-websites, mobile-broadcasting, mobile-marketing, mobile-solutions, mobile-advertising, mobile-services, mobile-platform, mobile-messaging, mobile-website-management, mobile-marketing-platform, mobile-optimized-websites
overview:
Lenco Mobile USA is a mobile marketing company that makes mobile marketing and mobile media effective for agencies, brand owners, carriers, broadcasters, content owners, application developers, and incredibly useful for our end-users. Lenco Mobile USA products and services include Mercury API, a mobile messaging platform that allows apps and websites to program against it and gain the needed software that enables SMS/MMS messaging, Build.mobi, a mobile website management platform that allows clients to create, manage, and market hundreds of mobile websites in minutes from a central interface, mobile broadcasting, ad serving solutions, list management, and more.

Lenco Mobile USA makes mobile marketing effective by providing innovative technologies, proprietary mobile solutions, aggregating advertisers and audience and scientifically matching the right ad with the right audience in the right delivery channel for maximum ROI. Mobile streaming is provided as another mobile channel to deliver rich media content to your audience.

Lenco Mobile USA helps clients manage the convergence of data touch points across mobile, broadcasting, Internet, and loyalty so that they clearly see the information needed to drive results. Lenco Mobile USA makes mobile marketing effective.
